snippet: Accused of money laundering, Msgr. Nunzio Scarano said he was holding money for charity. But some see him as a symbol of a financial system gone awry.
abstract: Scandal surrounding Msgr Nunzio Scarano, Vatican official on trial for extensive money laundering, has cast spotlight on widespread suspicion of corruption within Roman Catholic Church's financial system; several Italian investigations into money-laundering by organized crime, corrupt politicians and businessmen have revealed connections to Vatican Bank, which maintains opaque money transfer system.
lead_paragraph: Accused of money laundering, Msgr. Nunzio Scarano said he was holding money for charity. But some see him as a symbol of a financial system gone awry.

headline.seo: Some See Msgr. Nunzio Scarano, Who Is Accused of Money Laundering, As a Symbol of a Financial System Gone Awry
headline.main: Of Virtue and Vice, and a Vatican Priest
